details.arabic_diacless: اللٰهم أعني على ذكرك، وشكرك، وحسن عبادتك
details.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ أَعِنِّيْ عَلَى ذِكْرِكَ، وَشُكْرِكَ، وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِكَ
details.translations: O Allah, help me to remember You, to give You thanks, and to perform Your worship in the best manner.
details.reference: Abu Dawud 2/86, An-Nasa'i 3/53. See also Al-Albani Sahih Abu Dawud 1 /284

pageTitle: After the last tashahhud & before salam #5
